name: Recall (itch) (singingstranger)
description:
Controls: 

Interact: LMB

Movement: WASD or Arrows

Exit certain scenes: Space Bar

Exit game: Escape

The individual levels in all their messy glory are already up on itch.io but now there is finally a version that combines them all into one smooth(ish) experience. 

This is still fairly early access. Audio is missing, cues are messed up, etc. If all else fails, exit out, re-load and select the level you got stuck on.
